articles.author: Jones Hayden
articles.title: Germany's Scholz 'concerned' over prospect of far-right win in France - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “I hope that parties that are not Le Pen — to put it that way — are successful in the election,” Scholz told public broadcaster ARD.
articles.content:
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Sunday that he was “concerned” about the prospect of a victory for Marine Le Pens far-right National Rally in the French parliamentary election.
